explains: n. （建筑物的）管路系统，管道设备；管道工程，管子工的工作；<非正式>体内“管道”，排泄系统
wordGroup: plumbing system 管道系统，管道设备；水暖设备系统

sentences.en: They had ensured the plumbing was overhauled a year ago.
sentences.cn: 他们确保管道设备一年前已被彻底检修过。

sentences.en: Most of the houses in the capital don't have indoor plumbing.
sentences.cn: 首都大多数房屋没有室内管道装置。

sentences.en: She learned the rudiments of bricklaying, wiring, and plumbing.
sentences.cn: 她学过一些砌砖、布线和管道工程的基本技术。
